pr_title: Add timeout to cluster controller test

timeline.message: Add back @Ignore and add timeout for tests

timeline.bodyText: I'm assuming this is to reduce the amount of load generated by the test?
timeline.author: vekterli

replies.bodyText: Yes, and we usually have 3 and not 5 controllers. But this is not important, I think I just tried it out
replies.author: hmusum
